com.tavianator.sangria.core

Class DelayedError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tavianator.sangria.core.DelayedError

  • public class DelayedError
extends Object
    Similar to Binder.addError(String, Object...), but can be canceled later. Useful for enforcing correct usage of fluent APIs.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tavian Barnes (tavianator@tavianator.com)

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static DelayedError create(Binder binder,
                  String message,
                  Object... args)
        Create a DelayedError.
        Parameters:
        binder - The binder to attach the error to.
        message - The format string for the message.
        args - Arguments that will be passed to the format string.
        Returns:
        A DelayedError token that can be canceled later.
        See Also:
        Binder.addError(String, Object...)

      • create

        public static DelayedError create(Binder binder,
                  Throwable t)
        Create a DelayedError.
        Parameters:
        binder - The binder to attach the error to.
        t - The Throwable that caused this potential error.
        Returns:
        A DelayedError token that can be canceled later.
        See Also:
        Binder.addError(Throwable)

      • create

        public static DelayedError create(Binder binder,
                  Message message)
        Create a DelayedError.
        Parameters:
        binder - The binder to attach the error to.
        message - The error message.
        Returns:
        A DelayedError token that can be canceled later.
        See Also:
        Binder.addError(Message)

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel this error.
